DOC.brief_summary: Youth who participate in the Circle of Life (COL) program will report less sexual risk taking behavior compared to youth who do not receive the program.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of a Culturally-based Intervention on Sexual Risky Behavior Among Young American Indian Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: Youth who participate in the Circle of Life (COL) program will report less sexual risk taking behavior and fewer pregnancies compared to youth who do not receive the program.
DOC.criteria: 1012 years old at baseline A member of participating Native Boys and Girls Club Signed Parental Consent Form Signed Parental Permission Form Signed Child Assent Form None Noted
